body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting our customer support team. My name is Ronald Howard and I'm a representative from XYZ Hotels. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Stephanie Thomas.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Stephanie. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I recently stayed at one of your hotels and was disappointed with the amenities available.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that. Could you provide me with your reservation number and the date of your stay for me to look into this further?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My reservation number is five six two zero and I stayed at the hotel on the twenty fourth of August.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information. I'll investigate the matter and get back to you soon.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, I appreciate your prompt attention.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Stephanie. Thank you for reaching out to us. Have a great day!
